nodes.text: Mon Adapyne was an MC80B Star Cruiser that saw service with the New Republic Defense Fleet and later the Galactic Federation of Free Alliances during the Yuuzhan Vong War.

During the Yuuzhan Vong War, Mon Adapyne served as the flagship of General Keyan Farlander The vessel participated in many battles, including the Second Battle of Obroa-skai, the Battle of Ebaq, and the Battle of Yuuzhan'tar.
